Label: Magic Library
MechanicalEffect: Source of lore; +1 to research rolls; may host an Archivist NPC

Label: Tavern
MechanicalEffect: Primary rumor source; hire mercs; low-cost lodging

Label: Coffee Shop
MechanicalEffect: Social hub; roll D6 for rumor quality; low-cost intel

Label: School
MechanicalEffect: Training site; offers a short training job (gain 1 XP)

Label: Temple
MechanicalEffect: Place of sanctuary; healing services available; may host a quest

Label: Museum
MechanicalEffect: Historic artifacts; rumor seed about lost relic; hire a guide

Label: Hall of Heroes
MechanicalEffect: Ceremony site; reputation gain for heroic acts

Label: Cave
MechanicalEffect: Hidden POI; good for secret meetings or smuggling

Label: Mini Market
MechanicalEffect: Cheap supplies; barter possible; hire local courier

Label: Alchemy
MechanicalEffect: Crafting services; can convert reagents into items

Label: Ghost Ship
D6Roll: An ancient ship drifts in the warp; salvage what you can.

Label: Mist Covered
D6Roll: Low, clinging mists hide the streets and docks.
